title: Mahou Shoujo Site (Magical Girl Site)
synopsis: Every day, Aya Asagiri thinks about killing herself. She is bullied relentlessly at school, and at home, her older brother Kaname physically abuses her to relieve the academic stress put on him by their father.
characters: ['Asagiri, Aya', 'Yatsumura, Tsuyuno', 'Anazawa, Nijimi', 'Shizukume, Sarina', 'Shioi, Rina', 'Amagai, Kosame', 'Suirenji, Kiyoharu', 'Asagiri, Kaname', 'Takiguchi, Asahi', 'Izumigamine, Mikari']
